--- title: Quantum Espresso to PERTURBO input parameters sidebar: mydoc_sidebar last_updated: January 06, 2020 permalink: mydoc_param_qe2pert.html folder: mydoc toc: false ---

General input parameters

| prefix | outdir | phdir | qe_band_min | qe_band_max | num_wann | system_2d | nk1 | nk2 | nk3 | debug | lwannier | load_ephmat | eig_corr | polar_alpha | asr | thickness_2d |

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
prefix

Variable type: string

Job name prefix. It should be the same as the prefix used in QE.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
outdir

Variable type: string

Name of the directory where the QE nscf output directory prefix.save is located, and where the e-ph matrix elements prefix_elph.h5 will be stored.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
phdir

Variable type: string

Name of the directory where the phonon "save" directory is located.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
qe_band_min

Variable type: integer
Default value: 1

Lowest band index used in Wannier90.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
qe_band_max

Variable type: integer
Default value: 10000

Highest band index used in Wannier90.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
num_wann

Variable type: integer
Default value: 1

Number of Wannier functions.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
system_2d

Variable type: logical
Default value: .false.

Set it to .true. if the system is 2D.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
nk1

Variable type: integer

Number of k points along x-axis used in the Wannierization.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
nk2

Variable type: integer

Number of k points along y-axis used in the Wannierization.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
nk3

Variable type: integer

Number of k points along z-axis used in the Wannierization.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
debug

Variable type: logical
Default value: .false.

Set to .true. to turn on the debug mode.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
lwannier

Variable type: logical
Default value: .true.

Set to .true. to rotate the wavefunctions using Wannier unitary matrix before computing e-ph matrix elements.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
load_ephmat

Variable type: logical
Default value: .false.

Set to .true. to load prefix_elph.h5 from the directory specified by the variable outdir.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
eig_corr

Variable type: string

File containing the Kohn-Sham eigenvalues (usually called prefix.eig).

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
polar_alpha

Variable type: real
Default value: 1.0

Used only in polar materials. To be consistent with rigid_bulk, enforce alpha=1.0 for lattice dynamical.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
asr

Variable type: string
Default value: crystal
Options:
.false.
no Acoustic Sum Rules imposed
simple
3 translational asr imposed by correction of the diagonal elements of the force constants matrix
crystal
3 translational asr imposed by optimized correction of the force constants (projection)

Indicates the type of Acoustic Sum Rule imposed.

GENERAL INPUT PARAMETERS
thickness_2d

Variable type: real
Default value: 6.0

Thickness of the 2d system (in Ã…), used in the 2D polar e-ph correction. Only needed when system_2d=.true.
